CustomAction.Title: Change Password
CustomAction.Description: Click here to change your password

UrlAction.Url: javascript:(function () { var o = { url:'/_layouts/15/ChangePassword/changepassword.aspx', title: 'Change Password',width: 350, autoSize: true, showClose: false, }; SP.SOD.execute('sp.ui.dialog.js', 'SP.UI.ModalDialog.showModalDialog', o); }) ();
